Html:
Hello,

i have tried to get the sine wave example running on an AsioOut, but it sounds more like a distorted square wave. is it possible that the AsioOut only supports PCM formats? the asio .wav file playback just works...

If so, how can i fill my buffers with Ieee floats and convert to PCM? or whats the best way to palyback Ieee on ASIO? i would love to avoid sample conversions..
